SELECT @rownum :=@rownum + 1 AS rowNum, a.* FROM (SELECT @rownum := 0) r, cw_base_employee a
a.`name` LIKE concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%')
and a.`sextype` =#{sex}
and a.`nation` LIKE concat(concat('%',#{nation}),'%')
and a.`ipcard` LIKE concat(concat('%',#{ipcard}),'%')
and a.`address` LIKE concat(concat('%',#{address}),'%')
and a.`company` LIKE concat(concat('%',#{company}),'%')
and a.`telephone` LIKE concat(concat('%',#{telephone}),'%')
ORDER BY rowNum ASC

SELECT b.id, b.peopleId, b.credentialNo, b.peopleName, c.enumName, TIMESTAMPDIFF( YEAR, str_to_date(b.birthDate, '%Y-%m-%d'), CURDATE() ) AS age, b.label, b.facePic, b.idCardPic FROM cw_relation_people_house AS a, cw_base_people AS b, cw_base_enum AS c WHERE a.houseId = #{id} AND a.peopleId = b.peopleId AND c.enumValue = a.relation AND c.enumType = "houseRelation"
SELECT @rownum :=@rownum + 1 AS rowNum, b.* FROM (SELECT @rownum := 0) r, cw_base_company a, cw_base_employee b WHERE b.companyId =a.id and a.id =#{id} ORDER BY rowNum ASC
